name: Sheep or Fall
description:
Jump across the gap by bouncing on sheep.

Every time you make it across, the game gets harder. There is a win screen if you are skilled enough to make it across enough times. The end screen reveals a pretty neat secret about the game.

Comment if you make it to the win screen!

Controls: The game will only listen to gamepad controls if you have a gamepad connected. Otherwise it will use keyboard. Gamepad is recommended for better control.

Movement:  Left stick or WASD/arrow keys.

Jump:  A or Space (not that jumping is useful in this game).

Made for Geta Jam 8 and met the Hardmode Challenge of no words or text.

Buzzwords used in the project: 

  • Unity
  • DOTS
  • ECS
  • Burst
  • C# Jobs
  • GPU Animation
  • LWRP
  • ShaderGraph
  • VFX Graph
  • Blender 2.80

If I get enough requests I will write a dev log about this crazy journey.
